name: Jyfes
description: This shows all .gifs from an Apache index.

DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: A comma seperated list of hostnames this site can be accessed.

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

DJANGO_GIF_SOURCE.description: The Apache index page to pull from

DJANGO_SOURCE_CACHE_TIMEOUT.description: The number of seconds to wait between polling the gif source.
